abstract: The police said that the victim had fought violently with his mother in the past.
snippet: The police said that the victim had fought violently with his mother in the past.
lead_paragraph: When the police came to Apartment 11G at 74 West 92nd Street on Friday night, they were met at the door by a woman holding a bloody sponge. On the floor behind her was the body of her 18-year-old son, dead from a stab wound to his thigh, the police said Saturday.

headline.main: Woman Is Questioned in Killing of Son, 18, on Upper West Side
